description:
Bjoern Jacke discovered that Exim incorrectly handled DKIM keys. In certain
configurations, private DKIM signing keys could be leaked to the log files.

exim4.description: Exim is a mail transport agent
Exim is a mail transport agent

Exim is a mail transport agent

title: Exim vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Exim could be made to expose private DKIM signing keys.
